item.title: I'm obsessed with detective games, and I think these 9 prove that 2025 was the best year for the genre ever
item.description:
I’m obsessed with detective games, and I think these 9 prove that 2025 was the best year for the genre ever

It’s a real genre renaissance out there, chief.
